excerpt: Large lake for boating & sunset viewing, featuring a waterfront park & a nearby temple.
detail_description: Unkal Lake is a large and picturesque lake in Hubli-Dharwad, offering activities like boating and sunset viewing. The waterfront park nearby provides a perfect spot for relaxation, while the temple in the vicinity adds a touch of cultural charm to the area. Additionally, there are restaurants with delightful views of Unkal Lake where visitors can savor Chinese and Thai cuisine.
name: Unkal Lake
address: Bairidevarkoppa, Hubballi, Karnataka 580025

excerpt: Expansive glass-&-steel open-air building used for flower shows & concerts, surrounded by greenery.
detail_description: The Indira Gandhi Glass House in Sadashiva Nagar, Hubballi is a stunning open-air structure made of glass and steel, often used for flower shows, concerts, and various events. The surrounding garden is meticulously maintained with lush greenery, colorful flower beds, and well-trimmed lawns. This picturesque setting makes it perfect for leisurely strolls, photography sessions, or simply enjoying some peaceful time amidst nature.
name: Indira Gandhi Glass House || Sadashiva Nagar || Hubballi
address: Sadashiv Nagar, Hubballi, Karnataka 580030, India

detail_description: The Banashankari Temple, constructed in the 13th century by the Chalukyas, stands as a remarkable testament to their artistic and sculptural prowess. This stone-carved masterpiece is dedicated to the Hindu deity Shiva, showcasing intricate craftsmanship from the Chalukya era.
name: Banashankari temple
address: 9386+3CH, Dharwad, Hubballi, Karnataka 580030, India

excerpt: Leafy hill offering scenic views, a children's playgorund & a casual counter-serve restaurant.
detail_description: Nrupatunga Betta, also known as Naupada Hill, is a popular tourist spot in Hubli. It's a leafy hill that provides stunning views of the surrounding area and features a children's playground and a casual counter-serve restaurant. The monsoon season turns Hubballi into a heavenly abode with lush greenery and beautiful waterfalls, making it an ideal time to visit this natural wonder.
name: Nrupatunga Betta
address: Rajnagar, Vidya Nagar, Hubballi, Karnataka 580032, India

detail_description: Sri Siddharoodha Swamiji Math Trust Committee Hubballi is a revered religious community established by the followers of Sri Siddharoodha Swami, who attained "Samadhi" in 1929. The math has welcomed distinguished guests such as Lokmanya Bal Gangadhar Tilak and Mahatma Gandhi.
name: Sri Siddharoodha Swamiji Math Trust Committee Hubballi
address: Hubli - Karwar Rd, Heggeri Colony, Old Hubli, Hubballi, Karnataka 580024, India

name: Nrupatunga Hills
address: 94HH+283, Karn, Rajnagar, Vidya Nagar, Karnataka 580032, India

detail_description: Urban Oasis Mall- Hubballi is a popular shopping destination in the city, offering a wide range of retail options and entertainment facilities. The mall features a game zone for kids, various food options, and clean washrooms. Visitors can explore different shops including clothing stores, ice cream shops, and electronic outlets like laptop stores. Additionally, the mall houses well-known brands such as KFC and Domino's along with a cinema theatre.
name: Urban Oasis Mall || Gokul Road || Hubballi
address: Cts No, 4784/B, 2nd Cross Gokul Rd, Karnataka 580030, India

detail_description: Sri Siddharoodha Math is a serene and convenient spot for devotees, built in honor of Shri Siddharoodha Swamy. The architectural style of the math is aesthetically pleasing and mesmerizes tourists. Visitors can experience divine bliss at this wonderful devotional place, which also offers super food for those seeking peace and tranquility.
name: Sri Siddharoodha Math
address: 74XW+M72, Dharwad, Karnataka 580024, India

detail_description: Nestled in the heart of Dewangpeth, the Banashankari Temple is a stunning example of ancient architecture, dating back to the 13th century. Built by the Chalukyas, this sacred site is dedicated to Goddess Banashankari, a revered incarnation of Goddess Parvathi. The temple boasts an elevated idol that allows visitors to admire its beauty from various angles.
name: Banashankari Temple
address: 94FQ+VHG, Dewangapeth, Hubballi, Karnataka 580032, India

excerpt: Unassuming, compact museum featuring equipment & items that run on solar energy.
detail_description: SUN RAY SOLAR MUSEUM is a compact and unassuming museum that showcases a unique concept featuring various solar-powered equipment and gadgets. The museum also offers visitors the opportunity to purchase some solar-powered items such as mobile chargers and cool caps. It houses a small temple dedicated to the Sun god in the courtyard, making it an ideal destination for science enthusiasts. Additionally, visitors can expect comprehensive collections of solar devices with knowledgeable guides available to assist them during their visit.
name: SUN RAY SOLAR MUSEUM
address: 59/1, 7th Cross Rd, Vijay Nagar, kori, Vidya Nagar, Hubballi, Karnataka 580032, India

detail_description: Barbeque Nation in Hubballi is a popular spot for food enthusiasts, offering amazing Indian and barbecue dishes. It's highly recommended by visitors for its fantastic food. The restaurant is well-regarded among the top dining options in Hubballi, making it a must-visit place for those looking to enjoy delicious meals.
name: Barbeque Nation - Hubli
address: 2nd floor, Venkatagiri Plaza, Opp. Oasis Mall, Gokul Rd, Karnataka 580030, India

name: Shri Siddharoodha swami sabha bhavan
address: 944F+633, Kallur Layout, Hubballi, Karnataka 580021, India

name: Shri Bhanji D Khimji Stadium (BDK ground)
address: 94JP+4R6, Midmac Metro Park, Hubballi, Karnataka 580032, India

name: Shri Navagraha Temple
address: Desai Park, near Prakash Colony, Suvidha Colony, Hubballi, Karnataka 580023, India

address: 945W+43Q, CHURCH ROAD, Club Rd, Keshwapur, Karnataka 580023, India

address: 84QH+6CH, Unnamed Road, Nava Ayodhya Nagar, Ayodhya Nagar, Channapet, Hubballi, Karnataka 580024, India

excerpt: Landscaped park with an art gallery, marriage museum, ornate fountains & film & animal sculptures.
detail_description: The Utsav Rock Garden is a picturesque park situated near the Pune-Bengaluru National Highway that features an art gallery, a marriage museum, and intricately designed fountains. The park boasts of intricate sculptures depicting both animals and films, with an added village-like feel that makes it an ideal spot for picnics with family. One can easily spend up to four hours exploring the great works of art alongside stories about them.
name: Utsav Rock Garden
address: On NH-4 Shiggaon Taluk, Gotagodi, Karnataka 581197, India

excerpt: Serene Hindu temple with 4 deities, known for offering cultural activities & a restaurant.
detail_description: The ISKCON Sri Sri Krishna Balaram Temple is a peaceful Hindu temple that houses four deities and is renowned for its cultural events and dining facility. Although it was established in 2014, this religious center offers an intimate setting for devotees of Lord Krishna and Pravu Nitai to experience a serene environment while enjoying kirtan. Despite its small size, the temple provides a fantastic ambiance that everyone can appreciate.
name: ISKCON Sri Krishna Balarama Temple
address: KSFC, Hubballi-Dharwad Road, Besides, Rayapur, Hubballi, Karnataka 580009, India

excerpt: Along with shrines to its namesake leader, this serene temple offers daily worship, meals & events.
detail_description: This tranquil temple, dedicated to its revered leader, showcases daily rituals, communal meals, and various events. Renowned for its aesthetic appeal and well-maintained ambiance, this spacious sanctuary boasts vibrant decorations. During festive occasions like utsava or jaatre, the premises come alive with bustling activities. Visitors can relish delectable snacks like girmit and bajji from the stalls outside while savoring affordable yet delicious sugarcane juice.
name: Shri Siddaroodha Swami Matha - Hubballi
address: 84P9+2H5, Srinivas Nagar, Hubballi, Karnataka 580024, India

name: Sadhanakeri Lake & Garden || Dharwad
address: FX8P+5MW, Sadhankeri, Police Head Quarter's, Dharwad, Karnataka 580008, India

excerpt: Semi-ruined 11th-century Hindu temple honoring Shiva, with elaborately carved stone facades.
name: Chandramouleshwara Temple, Hindu Shiva temple
address: Sai Nagar, Hubballi, Karnataka 580031, India

name: Nature First Eco-Village
address: Dharwad, Karnataka 580118, India

excerpt: Small temple beside a lake, with the current structure dating to at least the 1500s.
detail_description: The Nuggikeri Hanuman Temple is a serene Hindu temple located in Dharwad, surrounded by lush greenery and featuring a picturesque lake. Its current structure dates back to the 1500s, making it an ancient marvel of architecture. Visitors can approach the temple via three routes- straight walking path, long car/bike route from Sidramaiah Nagar or through the village of Nuggikeri.
name: Shri Nuggikeri Hanumantha Temple
address: C274+59X, Kalghatagi Road, beside Shree Nuggekeri Hanuman Temple, Dharwad, Karnataka 580002, India

excerpt: Family-friendly waterpark featuring slides & a wave pool, plus indoor games & dining.
detail_description: Hubli Water World is a family-friendly waterpark that boasts various slides, a wave pool and indoor games. It is an ideal destination for spending quality time with loved ones. The park offers affordable ticket prices, with the cost being Rs.300 per person from 2:30 pm to 5:30 pm without food or Rs.550 for a full day's adventure including food. Visitors recommend spending around three hours at the park to fully enjoy all the attractions along with children.
name: Hubli Water World
address: Hubli-Karwar Road,Anchatageri, Hubballi, Karnataka 581204, India

detail_description: Dharwad Adventure Base is a fantastic destination for families and friends seeking a day filled with excitement and fun. Visitors can immerse themselves in various activities, starting with an engaging maze that challenges your navigation skills. The oversized roller balls provide a unique experience, allowing adults to relive their childhood as they tumble around inside. The adventure area features swings and small challenges that keep everyone entertained, while the tractor and buffalo rides add to the thrill.
name: Dharwad Adventure Base
address: Alnavar road, near toll booth, Dharwad, Karnataka 580007, India

excerpt: Educational museum with science & technology exhibits, an inflatable planetarium & kids' activities.
name: Dharwad Regional Science Center
address: CXWJ+3PR, Pavate Nagar, Karnatak University Campus, Dharwad, Karnataka 580003, India
